CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In this manuscript , we report the synthesis and characterization of three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-(2-ethylhex- yl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole ) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ) , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ) and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ) , by using IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. IDT: Indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene
2. NT: Naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole
3. PIDT-EHNT: Poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(2-ethylhexyl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole]
4. PIDT-DTNT: Poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(hexyl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole]
5. PIDT-C12NT: Poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole)]
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

1. IDT: Indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene
2. NT: Naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole
3. PIDT-EHNT: Poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(2-ethylhexyl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole]
4. PIDT-DTNT: Poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(hexyl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole]
5. PIDT-C12NT: Poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole)]

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: In this manuscript , we report the synthesis and characterization of three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-(2-ethylhex- yl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole ) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ) , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ) and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ) , by using IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-EHNT: This is the name of the first conjugated polymer, which is a copolymer of IDT and EHNT.
2. PIDT-DTNT: This is the name of the second conjugated polymer, which is a copolymer of IDT and DTNT.
3. PIDT-C12NT: This is the name of the third conjugated polymer, which is a copolymer of IDT and C12NT.
4. IDT: This is an abbreviation for Indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene, which is used as a weak donor in the synthesis of the conjugated polymers.
5. NT: This is an abbreviation for Naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole, which is used as a strong acceptor in the synthesis of the conjugated polymers.
6. Scheme 2: This is not a property name, but rather a reference to a diagram or illustration in the manuscript.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

1. PIDT-EHNT: This is the name of a conjugated polymer with the property of being a copolymer of IDT and EHNT.
2. PIDT-DTNT: This is the name of a conjugated polymer with the property of being a copolymer of IDT and DTNT.
3. PIDT-C12NT: This is the name of a conjugated polymer with the property of being a copolymer of IDT and C12NT.
4. IDT: This is a monomer with the property of being an Indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]dithiophene unit used in the synthesis of the conjugated polymers.
5. NT: This is a monomer with the property of being a Naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole unit used in the synthesis of the conjugated polymers.

These entities are relevant as they describe the materials being synthesized and characterized in the manuscript.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this manuscript , we report the synthesis and characterization of three D-A type IDT-NT based low band gap conjugated polymers , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-(2-ethylhex- yl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole ) ] ( PIDT - EHNT ) , poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s- indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole) ] ( PIDT - DTNT ) and poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole))] ( PIDT-C12NT ) ( Scheme 2 ) , by using IDT as a weak donor and NT as a strong acceptor.

Let's think step by step.

1. PIDT-EHNT: This is a conjugated polymer identified by the name [poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-ethylhexyl)-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)]
2. PIDT-DTNT: This is a conjugated polymer identified by the name [poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(4-hexyl-2-thienyl)-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis[1,2,5]thiadiazole)]
3. PIDT-C12NT: This is a conjugated polymer identified by the name [poly[2,7-(4,4,9,9-tetra(p-octylphenyl)-s-indaceno-[1,2-b:5,6-b′]-dithiophene)-alt-3,7-(di(3′-dodecyl-5-(2,2′-bithienyl))-naphtho[1,2-c:5,6-c]bis(1,2,5-thiadiazole)]
4. IDT: This is a compound identified as a weak donor.
5. NT: This is a compound identified as a strong acceptor.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. PIDT-EHNT: Conjugated polymer with a reported low band gap.
2. PIDT-DTNT: Conjugated polymer with a reported low band gap.
3. PIDT-C12NT: Conjugated polymer with a reported low band gap.
4. IDT: Weak donor compound.
5. NT: Strong acceptor compound.

These entities are relevant as they are the materials mentioned in the paragraph and have material properties (low band gap, donor, acceptor) that are being reported.
